item.title: Princes Harry, William’s ‘Rift’ Linked To Princess Diana - International Business Times
item.description:
Princes Harry, William’s ‘Rift’ Linked To Princess Diana  International Business Times

Prince Harry and Prince William’s alleged rift reportedly has links to their late mom Princess Diana. The Sun’s royal correspondent Emily Andrews spoke to a palace courtier about the royal siblings’ falling out and was told that Prince Harry went mental after his older brother tried to wreck his relationship with Meghan Markle. “As one royal courtier told me: ‘It’s my opinion that Harry feels he couldn’t protect his mother, so he’s going all out to protect his wife. This is his way of atoning. He will book absolutely no criticism of Meghan – and he is so sensitive he often sees criticism or...

item.title: Prince William Previously ‘Shunned’ Idea Of Marrying Kate Middleton - International Business Times
item.description:
Prince William Previously ‘Shunned’ Idea Of Marrying Kate Middleton  International Business Times

Prince William previously shunned Kate Middleton and the idea of marrying her – or anyone – during one of his interviews. In the book “The Making of a Royal Romance” by Katie Nicholl, it was revealed that the future King once denied any suggestion that he would wed Middleton anytime soon. When he was just 22 years old, he was asked about settling down, and he said, “Look, I’m only 22 for God’s sake. I’m too young to marry at my age. I don’t want to get married until I am at least 28 or maybe 30.” Prince William also thought that Prince Harry would tie the knot before him, but this didn’t ha...

item.title: Did Meghan Markle, Kate Middleton Make ‘Powerful Women’ List? - International Business Times
item.description:
Did Meghan Markle, Kate Middleton Make ‘Powerful Women’ List?  International Business Times

Forbes’ annual “World’s 100 Most Powerful Women” list was released earlier this week, but you might be surprised to learn that neither Meghan Markle nor Kate Middleton made the cut. Despite how much attention the two garner from the public on a daily basis, and despite all of the events they attend and the charitable initiatives they’re always working on, Markle and the Duchess of Cambridge’s names are not on the list. They do have a royal relative who made it, though. Out of the 100 women on the listing, Queen Elizabeth II ranks among the top 25 most powerful women of the world. She comes ...

item.title: Prince George Is Princess Diana’s ‘Reincarnation,’ Psychic Claims - International Business Times
item.description:
Prince George Is Princess Diana’s ‘Reincarnation,’ Psychic Claims  International Business Times

Prince George is claimed to be Princess Diana’s reincarnation by psychic Sharon Prasad. In the Netflix documentary “The Royals,” the expert said that Prince George’s July 22 birthday makes him Cancer. He shares the same zodiac sign with his late grandmother. “If we have to look at the Cancer influence with Lady Diana this is really interesting because it shows a life-death connection. It resonates a lot of karma. What that actually means is that he’s the reincarnation of Lady Diana,” Prasad said. According to Vedic astrology, an ancient Indian practice, a person’s birth chart can show how t...

item.title: Meghan Markle And Prince Harry’s Rumored Baby Name Picks - International Business Times
item.description:
Meghan Markle And Prince Harry’s Rumored Baby Name Picks  International Business Times

Meghan Markle and Prince Harry have yet to reveal whether they are having a boy or a girl (or twins, if rumors are to be believed), but they are said to have nailed down potential baby names if their child turns out to be a boy. While the Duke and Duchess of Sussex have yet to settle on one name, Life & Style Magazine reports they have narrowed it down to two royal monikers. “The top contenders are Charles, after Harry’s father, and Arthur,” shared a source. “But nothing’s definite yet.” Arthur was thought to be a strong contender for Prince William and Kate Middleton’s third child ahead of...

item.title: How the Duchess of Cambridge revolutionised the humble hairband - The Telegraph
item.description:
How the Duchess of Cambridge revolutionised the humble hairband  The Telegraph

Ever since the Duchess of Cambridge stepped up to her Royal duties in 2011 she has flown the flag for lavish hair accessories. From bold hats during state services to traditional ornate fascinators at society weddings, she has always taken a regal approach to Royal dressing and accessories. However since returning from maternity leave this autumn, the Duchess has modernised her once quite formal approach to hair accessories and has brought back traditional styles like the headband and pretty grosgrain ribbons in an elegant, modern way. As the suspected tension between the Duchess of Cambri...

item.title: Princes William, Harry’s Fashion Called ‘Disgusting’ By Fashion Experts - International Business Times
item.description:

Prince William and Prince Harry’s fashion has been dubbed as terrible and disgusting by fashion experts. In the Netflix documentary “The Royals,” Zoe Griffin, the editor and founder of Livelikeavip.com, talked about Prince Harry and Prince William’s style. “Prince Harry loves his chinos, and he wears rugby tops. Does he ever wear anything smart? Any suits? Is there any Ozwald Boateng or some tailoring? No. What does William wear? Disgusting grey suits. These boys have the luxury of any designer on earth wanting to dress them and they always look completely terrible,” she said. Neil Sean, a ...

item.title: Prince Charles Accused Princess Diana Of ‘Showing Off’ At A Party - International Business Times
item.description:
Prince Charles Accused Princess Diana Of ‘Showing Off’ At A Party  International Business Times

Prince Charles previously accused Princess Diana of showing off over a Christmas present-gone-wrong-incident many years ago. In the documentary “Princess Diana: The Woman Inside,” it was revealed how Princess Diana would often visit the rehearsals of the ballet companies in London when she was still alive. The late Princess of Wales also took part in daily classes at the English National Ballet in Kensington. Princess Diana was reportedly so excited to share what she learned in class to Prince Charles and wanted her performance to be her Christmas present for her husband. But the dad of two...

item.title: William, Kate, Meghan, and Harry Are Making Nice, for Now at Least - The Daily Beast
item.description:

Photo Illustration by The Daily Beast This week began with another set of challenging headlines for the young royals, as the internet continued to feed on the most compelling royal story in years; reports of a rift at the heart of the royal family, with a feud developing between the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge (William and Kate) and the Duke and Duchess of Sussex (Harry and Meghan). However, midweek, a concerted fightback began, with what appeared to be a deliberate leak from Kensington Palace that not only will both families be at Sandringham, the queen’s estate in Norfolk, for Christmas...

item.description:

Princess Charlotte has reached a new milestone. On Thursday, Prince William and Kate Middleton’s only daughter experienced her first Nativity play at Willcocks Nursery School. Prince William and Middleton have just returned from their day trip to Cyprus, where they hosted a Christmas party for the RAF personnel deployed in Akrotiri. ...

item.title: Why Kate Middleton Is Not Called Princess - International Business Times
item.description:
Why Kate Middleton Is Not Called Princess  International Business Times

Kate Middleton is known as the Duchess of Cambridge and not as a princess, unlike Princess Diana. Emily Hodgkin, a journalist for Express, said that even though Middleton is not referred to as Princess Kate or Princess Catherine, this title appears on Prince Louis’ birth certificate. On the legal document, she is registered as a Princess of the United Kingdom. However, the mom of three of officially referred to as Her Royal Highness, the Duchess of Cambridge.” Since she’s married to Prince William, she is also a princess. But when they tied the knot in 2011, he was given a peerage and becam...

item.title: Prince Harry Dubbed ‘Funniest Royal’ After Making Jokes - International Business Times
item.description:
Prince Harry Dubbed ‘Funniest Royal’ After Making Jokes  International Business Times

Prince Harry has been dubbed as the funniest royal after he uttered a slew of jokes at musical that he attended by himself. The Duke of Sussex watched “Bat Out of Hell,” which benefitted his charity, the Invictus Foundation. While there, he got up on stage to introduce the show and made everyone laugh. “I’m sure you’re all desperate for the show to start. So, just that. I really want to come on stage and say an enormous thank you to ‘Bat Out of Hell’ for putting tonight on and to all of you for buying tickets and for any of you that didn’t know that this was for the Invictus Foundation, you...

item.title: No, Kate Middleton Isn't Stealing Outfit Ideas From Meghan Markle - HuffPost
item.description:
No, Kate Middleton Isn't Stealing Outfit Ideas From Meghan Markle  HuffPost

Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge seemingly pulled a page from her sister-in-law’s stylebook and wore a blazer and trousers (gasp!) that look exactly like something Meghan, Duchess of Sussex would wear. And we must say, the look “Suits” her. The former Kate Middleton stepped out alongside her husband, Prince William, on Wednesday for an in honor of Royal Air Force personnel in Cyprus. She wore high-waisted, wide-legged trousers from Jigsaw with a tucked-in white shirt and an olive blazer (appropriately called the “Duchess wool blazer”) from Smyth, according to Go Fug Yourself, a website devot...

item.title: Kate Middleton’s Plans For Meghan Markle’s Baby Shower - International Business Times
item.description:
Kate Middleton’s Plans For Meghan Markle’s Baby Shower  International Business Times

Meghan Markle’s sister-in-law Kate Middleton is reportedly pulling out all the stops for a forthcoming baby shower for the expectant Duchess. Ahead of her spring due date, the Duchess of Cambridge is said to be planning a lavish affair to celebrate Prince Harry and Meghan’s first child. “Kate is planning a no-expenses sparred shower at Buckingham Palace,” an unnamed “friend” told Life & Style Magazine in their Dec. 10 print edition. The “dreamy” event is said to have a blue theme when it comes to dessert. “She’s hired a caterer to make blue cupcakes and a three-course lunch, and has drawn u...

item.title: Prince Charles Framed A ‘Sweet’ Photo With Meghan Markle At Home - International Business Times
item.description:
Prince Charles Framed A ‘Sweet’ Photo With Meghan Markle At Home  International Business Times

Prince Charles just proved how much he loves and adores Meghan Markle. Daily Mail’s royal reporter Rebecca English revealed that she spotted a sweet photo of the two royals displayed inside the future King’s home. “At Clarence House today, I spotted a framed black and white photograph (in the public area) of the Prince of Wales walking his soon to be daughter-in-law, Meghan Markle, towards the altar at St. George’s Chapel. It was very touching – and shows how much the moment meant to him,” she tweeted. English did not upload the photo with her tweet, but royal fans are aware of the touching...

item.title: How Prince Charles, Princess Diana's Divorce Impacted William's Future As King - International Business Times
item.description:
How Prince Charles, Princess Diana's Divorce Impacted William's Future As King  International Business Times

Prince Charles and Princess Diana’s divorce raised the idea for Prince William to be king and leapfrog his father. Royal experts Kaitlin Menza and Lisa Ryan discussed Prince Charles’ role as Queen Elizabeth II’s successor on the podcast “Royally Obsessed.” The experts talked about a 1992 book that was written the wake of Prince Charles and Princess Diana’s divorce. “The announcement of Charles and Diana’s divorce caused new speculation about whether Charles will ever become King. His mother, at 66, is in robust health and has made it clear that she considers being a Queen a job for life,” t...
